item.title: Undeniable gifts are buried under great pressure. Not everyone gets the opportunity to be stressed by the potential to achieve exceptional things.

item.title: By failing to prepare you are preparing to fail

item.title: Parkinson's law
item.description: work expands so as to fill the time available for its completion - Cyril Northcote Parkinson Parkinson’s law - Wikipedia

item.title: Think for yourself and question authority

item.title: It always takes longer than you expect, even when you take into account Hofstadter's Law
